game.name: Purple Jewel Dress Up Game
game.description:
Today is a very special day as you are going to meet with a lovely character Purple Jewel who loves all the things in Kawaii. She is very stylish and generally looking forward to get a new look. She has again decided today to make changes in her look. Would you help her to create a new that is also super cute? Join Purple Jewel Dress Up Game and be prepared to create your own best version! Find all the dress-up and accessory options on the right side of the screen!

You would have multiple different styles to select from in this one of the best girls games. Your job is to give this super cute girl a nice makeover and then guide her to grab an awesome look. Give her a casual look and also work on her preview regenerations and fusions as well! You can also get a chance to explore other popular characters as well in this HTML5 dressing game. Begin the fun by giving her a nice hairstyle and dying it in a new color while adding some highlights!

Give her eyes you want or make changes in her eyebrows and mouth expressions as per your desires! Change the color of her skin and dress her up with cute jacket, a crop top or an off-shoulder t-shirt and pair it with matching skirts or ripped pants in this dress-up game! Complete her look with sparkling jewels, weapons, wings, bows, hats, gloves, stockings or socks and a pair of matching shoes! Feel free to customize the color for each item! Try to be more creative in our new fashion girl games and have fun alone or with your friends without download!
